name: Small World
description:
This is a third person strategy adventure game.

I believe that a retro style background combined with cute cartoon characters can bring you a different gaming experience.

Game Features

The gameplay is easy and the process is fun. Use the directional keys to move characters, explore around, find the right path, and constantly pass levels.

The maze is filled with unknowns, and you need to carefully identify them. You will also encounter various puzzles during maze exploration. The maze is full of danger, but there are also many treasures hidden in the danger.

Explore different regions with different styles of puzzles. You need to find ways to solve these puzzles and find the items you need.

Each level requires overcoming numerous obstacles and ultimately finding a trophy to win.
